sentences.en: And then , we will deduct it as ROB in the ullage report.
sentences.cn: 好的, 那我们一会在ROB报告中扣除这部分体积.

sentences.en: Deduct all of the goodliness things as much as one likes.
sentences.cn: 尽情演绎人间的一切美好事物.

sentences.en: Do not deduct the commission from the value of the consignment.
sentences.cn: 不要从货物的价值中扣除佣金.

sentences.en: Do not deduct to commission from the value of consignment.
sentences.cn: 我们请求你方从发票中扣除我们的佣金.

sentences.en: If you send it through the post office they deduct 100.
sentences.cn: 如果你通过邮局寄钱,他们要扣掉100美元.

sentences.en: If you will just sign here, we will arrange for your bank to deduct your payments automatically.
sentences.cn: 麻烦您在这里签一下字，我们将联系您的银行自动扣除您的付款。

sentences.en: Mr. Cao had the rickshaw repaired and didn't deduct the cost from Xiangzi's wages.
sentences.cn: 曹先生把车收拾好,并没扣祥子的工钱.

sentences.en: Please don't deduct the commission from the payment for goods directly.
sentences.cn: 请不要从贷款中直接扣除佣金.

sentences.en: Sufficient space layer and perfect dimension deduct space philosophy.
sentences.cn: 丰富空间层次,完美尺度演绎空间哲学.

sentences.en: The company deducted this payment from his compensation.
sentences.cn: 公司从他的补偿金中扣除了这笔款项。

sentences.en: They will deduct 17 % from our payment ( commission ) for the tax.
sentences.cn: 他们公司将会在给我方的回款 ( 佣金 ) 中,扣除大约17%的税费.

sentences.en: To deduct or subtract from a cost or price.
sentences.cn: 减少从费用或价格中扣除或减去.

sentences.en: To deduct or withhold ( part of something due ) for an equitable reason.
sentences.cn: 扣除,扣留出于衡平的原因而减去或扣留 ( 到期某物的一部分 )

sentences.en: We send you herewith a cheque, value 90 have deduct the usual trade discount of 2.
sentences.cn: 依贸易惯例,扣除2□折扣后,奉上面额为90英镑支票一张.

sentences.en: We will deduct a collection service charge from the proceeds of course.
sentences.cn: 当然,我们要从中扣除取款的手续费.

sentences.en: You may deduct such commissions, charges, levies and duties from the Account.
sentences.cn: 阁下可以从户口中扣除该等佣金 、 收费 、 徵费及税项.

trans.tran_en: to take away an amount or part from a total
to take away an amount or part from a total
